p: Are you skilled at wrangling data with SQL & Python? Looking to apply those skills to more interesting, impactful projects? If so, this may be the role you have been looking for=E2=80=A6
p.2: I'm currently seeking Data Engineers for my client, a global player in risk management to work closely with client partners, understand their analytical needs, evaluate key performance metrics, and analyze trends.
p.4: You'll join an established practice working on some of the most interesting projects I've ever come across including forensic investigation, political risk, and high-profile mergers.

strong: > At this time this role is only open to US Citizens & Green Card holders <

li: Strong SQL and Python skills - R is a suitable alternative to Python
li.1: Experience building and/or maintaining ETL/ELT processes
li.2: Experience working in data visualization platforms such as Tableau or PowerBI
li.3: Strong communication skills with an ability to explain complex things in layman's terms
li.4: Knowledge of risk management would be advantageous but not required
li.5: Academic or professional experience with Data Science/ML would be attractive

u: The responsibilities of the Senior Data Analytics Consultant will be:

li: Design and implement qualitative and quantitative data analysis methodologies
li.1: Create dynamic data visualizations and dashboards for reporting, monitoring, and other business use cases
li.2: Identify and understand relationships between multiple data sources
li.3: Create and design data queries, procedures, and reports to address client requests and project strategies

li: Comprehensive benefits package including an annual bonus of up to 15%
li.1: Commitment to ensuring work/life balance including time off in lieu if you work overtime
li.2: Remote-first, flexible working with a laid-back Head of Practice
li.3: Extremely interesting, engaging, and topical projects, often with global organizations

strong: Please note that this role is remote-first and has little travel, although in the future a willingness to occasionally travel to visit clients is preferred. For this reason, candidates with easy connections to major cities will be at an advantage.
